mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and use responsive design frameworks to improve loading on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the size of images and utilize lazy loading for faster load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve keyword usage in titles and meta descriptions to target local search traffic better.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and reduce unnecessary pop-ups to improve overall usability.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and simplifying form fields.
